name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald PERKINS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald PERKINS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence and Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Washington County are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James H. McCune and Edward C. M. Morascyzk, Washington, for appellant.
Herman Bigi, Dist. Atty., Daniel L. Chunks, Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
427 A.2d 649
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald PERKINS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 2, 1981.
Decided April 15, 1981.
James H. McCune and Edward C. M. Morascyzk, Washington, for appellant.
Herman Bigi, Dist. Atty., Daniel L. Chunks, Washington, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
